entry.title: Sunday: Chance of drizzle. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
